statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={177.6}{e}^{{{0.0413}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0413}}\approx{1.0421647080652}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0421647080652}-{1}={0.042164708065177}\approx{0.0422} and the percent is 4.22.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
